document.full_text: new u.s. claims for unemployment benefits surprisingly rose last week to their highest level since january in a sign an anticipated recovery in labor markets may take time, a government report showed on thursday.
document.title: jobless claims jump in latest week
lines_and_colors: new u.s. claims for unemployment benefits surprisingly rose last week to their highest level since january in a sign an anticipated recovery in labor markets may take time, a government report showed on thursday.
